thread.title: Amazing video footage shows London from 360 degrees
thread.title_full: Amazing video footage shows London from 360 degrees

title: Amazing video footage shows London from 360 degrees
text: comments An amazing video shows London in a whole new way - from 360 degrees. A viral video marketer, known only as Orion, has created a mesmerising montage of scenes from around the capital taken as though from the air with a fish eye-style lens. He can be seen strolling through Chinatown, Trafalgar Square and across Tower Bridge, as well as riding a tube and walking past Big Ben as the city is made to look like a tiny planet. A viral video marketer, known only as Orion, has created a mesmerising montage of scenes from around the capital taken as though from the air with a fish eye-style lens He can be seen strolling through Chinatown, Trafalgar Square and across Tower Bridge as well as riding a tube escalator and walking past Big Ben Sometimes he walks alone and other times he poses with fellow tourists and even with a policeman and Pikachu. The lighthearted, bouncy soundtrack, plus the nonchalant expression on the man's face adds a comical vibe to the footage . He reveals at the end that the camera he is using - an Insta360 Nano - is in fact held out in front of him on a stick as he walks forward. RELATED ARTICLES
